title: nilaiyAna pErinbamE
sahitya:
nilaiyAna pErinbamE rAmA nin kazhaliNai tarumE aDimaikkenrum


anupallavi

  alai mOdum vAzhvil allum paghalum amudAna un nAmam aLLip-parugum enakku


caraNam    tavamuDaiyOr tamakkum kiDaindarkkarum perumai dAsharathi rAma dAsarkkaruLiNAi un
 pAvana nAmamallAl pArinil vErariyA bhakta kabIrukku parindaruL shorindAi
 mEvi rAga ratna mAlai shUTTi magizhnda darishanam tandAi
 pADum bhakariDaip-paramanun urukkaNDu paravashamuDan toNDu purindu peruvEn enrum
